entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers overnight. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Freezing rain beginning late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and afternoon.
